name: Six Shooter Halloween Demo
description:
The shards of the past... they're what we build the present on, right? To celebrate the season,  Olive and her friends set foot into a autumn forest, curious to see what they can find inside its leafy ceiling.

Six Shooter is a 3D action adventure platformer, where you take the role of Olive, a wandering adventurer, collecting fragments of positivity with her trusty grappling gun.

This demo includes:
A Sprawling Autumn Forest!
Over 20 Shards to collect!
Lots of Lore tidbits!
A Boss Fight!
A Photo Mode!
And Customization Features!
Can you unlock the secret golden pumpkin?


Controls:

WASD to Move
E to Select your Shot
R to Fire the Six Shooter
Left Click to Dodge Roll
Left Shift To Attack

Bear in mind that this is a very early stage in development, so some things may change, or some bugs may pop up. If you find any, feel free to use this comment section as a bug report!
